extendedInfo.description: Are you a George Michael fan? Do you know all there is to know about the iconic starâs personal and professional life? Then what better way to put your knowledge to the test than with this exciting new quiz book?The100 thought provoking questions in The George Michael Quiz Book have been compiled to test your memory of the events that have shaped the career of one of the most enduring singer-songwriterâs in the music business. The book covers Georgeâs early life, Wham!, memorable hits, awards, number one abums and many personal details as well as up to date information about Georgeâs life in recent months. Packed with fascinating facts, this book will tell you everything you ever wanted to know about one of the all-time bestselling artists in the music industry. This is a must-have book for all George Michael fans and anyone interested in finding out more about the man behind the music. Please Note that the book is stored on your phone and you do NOT need a data connection to read it.This is a full-length, quality digitized book.The George Michael Quiz Book, by Kim Kimber, is packaged with an easy to use functional book reader which means you can down load the App and start reading.This is a full length ebook version of this title.
